Batch Preview

Run large-scale parallel batch computing jobs

Apply for trial Purchase now

Azure Batch is currently available through Cloud Services and is offered as a free tier service. There are no additional charges for using Batch services in free tier services. You only pay for the underlying computing resources consumed by the selected cloud service instance, and the cost will be billed according to the number of minutes of use. For more details on these rates, visit the Cloud Services pricing page.

Regions Where Sold

Batch services are available in the following regions:

Territories Regions
Mainland China China East Data Center, China North Data Center

Support and Service Level Agreements

If you have any questions or need help, please visit Azure Support to select self-service or any other methods to contact us for support.

The Batch feature doesn’t offer a service level agreement during the preview period. If you want to learn more about the details of our server level agreement, please visit the Service Level Agreement page.
